issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hi,
when i try to deploy my application on android emulator or telephone i encountre this thip of error: 

{panel:title=The error}
[INFO] :   Generating C:\Users\USER\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\contatti\build\android\res\values\theme.xml
[INFO] :   Packaging application: C:\Users\USER\Android\sdk\build-tools\24.0.0-preview\aapt.exe "package" "-f" "-m" "-J" "C:\Users\USER\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\contatti\build\android\gen" "-M" "C:\Users\USER\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\contatti\build\android\AndroidManifest.xml" "-A" "C:\Users\USER\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\contatti\build\android\bin\assets" "-S" "C:\Users\USER\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\contatti\build\android\res" "-I" "C:\Users\USER\Android\sdk\platforms\android-23\android.jar" "-F" "C:\Users\USER\Documents\Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace\contatti\build\android\bin\app.ap_" "--auto-add-overlay" "--extra-packages" "ti.modules.titanium.ui:android.support.v7.appcompat:android.support.v7.cardview" "-S" "C:\Users\USER\AppData\Local\Temp\11637-2412-oj6eof/res" "-S" "C:\Users\USER\AppData\Local\Temp\11637-2412-djgiwx/res" "-S" "C:\Users\USER\AppData\Local\Temp\11637-2412-8fsl2q/res"
[ERROR] :  Failed to package application:
[ERROR] :  
[ERROR] :  
{panel}

Maybe because in precompiling time it says me: 

{panel:title=Warn}
[WARN] :   Android Build Tools 24 are too new and may or may not work with Titanium.
[WARN] :   If you encounter problems, select a supported version with:
[WARN] :      ti config android.buildTools.selectedVersion ##.##.##
[WARN] :    where ##.##.## is a version in  that is <=23.x
{panel}

comments.body:
Hello,

What version of Titanium SDK are you using? Use the latest one 5.2.2.GA. Are you using any custom theme in your Application?

Hi Sharif,
i use the latest version 5.2.2GA.
It's my first application and so i've follow the first application demo into the devoloper's doc.
I don't know how change android theme...maybe later i'll learn :)
